author: Rajini Rao
text:
Want to guess what this is? South Indian simple dish for cooling in summers
#Mosaruanna #Curdrice with seasoning and grapes, pomegranate  a dash of turmeric with grated coconut. Add more curd. Relish with Potato fry and pickle of course.
Have it after Rice & Rasam if you wish :-) https://t.co/vprTeCrL5v

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Does anyone know where I can watch the film #CapeFear online..The 1991, Robert deNiro starrer
Tried all #OTT platforms, #YouTube also to buy and watch. No luck.
#Amazon has DVDs for sale but not in India.
Pls. Share if you have any info.

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Dear @BescomHelpline. Can we expect power back today please? Yeah we know may trees uprooted, heavy lightning and outages. And its Sunday too. Still, any time frame by when we can expect? South Bengaluru
#bengalururains

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Will the #Dhoni magic work for #CSK. A bit late in the day?
Feel bad for #jadeja. Captaincy thrust on him, now snatched away. Is CSK management and control also all about Dhoni? #Justasking

author: Rajini Rao
text: The triple R effect. Maybe if I can add a third R to my name I could also spin some millions at the stock markets. All a matter of name, numerology and millions. Otherwise, what is the real content in #RRRblockbuster. Worth watching?

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Cool, cool Namma  bengaluru #bengalururains 
After the thunderstorm.👌🌧🌧🌧
Waiting for next two days to see if the Annual rains on May 1 and 2 will arrive 😊 GN folks😴😴 https://t.co/SSFxWgs9zV

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Let them drop, dry up and drift away in the autumn breeze. They will disperse, each a sweet story to tell, a song to sing 🎼
Let them not decay on my tombstone. I have too many beautiful memories of you.
Without you.... 
With you, it would have been Spring in autumn 🍁🍂💔❤ https://t.co/4emosXkOVO

author: Rajini Rao
text: Just when we needed finishers like #dineshkarthik to come in at the right time and stay !! #RCBvsGT

author: Rajini Rao
text: Well played #ViratKohli #RCB #RCBvGT Keep the faith. The past is behind.

author: Rajini Rao
text:
I don't know what it is, but as long as I can remember,it rains every single year on the 1st and 2nd of May. Let's hope it continues.
Met Dep forecast rains today in scorching #Bengaluru

text:
Has anyone tried this Online Store? Unable to add Item to cart.

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Is excessive fatigue due to the heat or is it due to some underlying medical condition?
Feels stupid to go to a doctor and tell him" I am feeling extremely tired" 🙃🙃
These are times when you miss your family doc & could casually pass off this "symptom" cleverly during a call😃

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Beer 🍺 is good for summers, to cool the body. But if you gulp it down with a flourish,to quench thirst you are in for trouble. Will make you more thirsty & dehydrated. Slow down!
Equally cooling is lemon barley water, lemon juice, rice water, buttermilk. Stay hydrated #Heatwave

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Such a #shame. We have no respect for age, no humanitarian consideration and no sense of dignity. They could have extended him time for vacating. So painful.

author: Rajini Rao
text: Personally, I love white swans, white doves❤ 🦢🕊They symbolize peace, calm, cleanliness. Not that I dislike pigeons but they are messy, noisy and cleaning up balconies everyday is a pain. Had to put up nets to avoid them. Their nest on your sill is supposed to be bad luck ! https://t.co/TCwCw4vcW9

author: Rajini Rao
text:
My views are the opposite.I would feel uncomfortable if a stranger paid on the 1st date.I'd rather do it myself but if his ego doesn't permit, then split the Bill

I’m a feminist, but I still think men should pay for the first date - they can learn from it https://t.co/AZNjtakRLQ

author: Rajini Rao
text: Can we hope to have sensible discussions on Twitter once @elonmusk is in full command, w/out people abusing and being rude just because we have a diametrically opposite POV? Some folks are so vehement with their POV you'd think the world revolved around them!

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Mazaa Mango used to be a thick pulpy Mango juice with a slightly tangy taste.
All you get now is a diluted mango colored, not even flavoured liquid which is so syrupy sweet !!

author: Rajini Rao
text:
Quite funny how people are talking about leaving twitter just because #ElonMuskBuysTwitter. Like anybody is bothered who stays on or who goes! 
My guess is that there will be hordes joining. 
A great move @elonmusk.Looking forward to more relaxed days w/out bots & trolls ruining

author: Rajini Rao
text:
I have tons and tons of work. Even if I sit up the whole night, I won't be able to finish.
And I've wasted 3 full hours, aimlessly loitering around,drinking juice and eating mangoes. Not even dinner. 
What does one call this type of behavior? #Escapist?

author: Rajini Rao
text: True. Even at normal gatherings, with a large guest list, daughters-in-law are expected to serve all the guests in batches and by the time  they sit down to eat, their hunger has vanished anyway. While sis-in-laws stand by watching with a condescending look! Uff!! been there! https://t.co/WUDGfyk8DJ
